fullstack.title: full-stack developer
fullstack.description:

I worked on custom rich-text editors with advanced formatting, AI-assisted transcription, and PDF generation for clinical workflows. junior.title: junior full-stack developer
junior.description:
As a junior developer, I worked on core product features across both backend and frontend. One highlight was building a teleconsultation module using AWS Chime, which ended up being used by multiple healthcare providers, including a public-sector pilot.

I also worked on a recurring subscription system and helped build an internal component library, which taught me a lot about scalability, consistency, and collaborating within a growing product team.

intern.title: full-stack developer intern
intern.description: During my internship, I worked closely with more experienced developers to learn how production systems are designed, tested, and maintained. I contributed to a financial module that handled real clinic operations like billing, inventory, and revenue sharing. It was my first deep exposure to real-world software development, working hands-on with Node.js, TypeScript, React, MySQL, and AWS.
